div.p: This case-insensitive code system http://fhir.awmf.org/awmf.ig/CodeSystem/cs-ocebm-2011-levels-of-evidence defines the following codes:

tr.td: Includes systematic reviews of randomized trials or n-of-1 trials.
Includes systematic reviews of cohort studies or individual cohort studies and low-quality randomized trials.
Includes systematic reviews of case-control studies or individual case-control studies.
Includes case series and poor-quality cohort and case-control studies.
Includes expert opinion without explicit critical appraisal, or based on physiology, bench research, or 'first principles'.

description.value: CodeSystem representing the Oxford Centre for Evidence-Based Medicine 2011 Levels of Evidence.

definition.value: Includes systematic reviews of randomized trials or n-of-1 trials.

valueString.value: Schließt systematische Reviews von randomisierten Studien oder n-of-1-Studien ein.

definition.value: Includes systematic reviews of cohort studies or individual cohort studies and low-quality randomized trials.

valueString.value: Schließt systematische Reviews von Kohortenstudien oder einzelne Kohortenstudien oder randomisierte Studien mit niedriger Qualität ein.

definition.value: Includes systematic reviews of case-control studies or individual case-control studies.

valueString.value: Schließt systematische Reviews von Fall-Kontroll-Studien oder einzelne Fall-Kontroll-Studien.

definition.value: Includes case series and poor-quality cohort and case-control studies.

valueString.value: Schließt Fallserien sowie Kohorten- und Fall-Kontroll-Studien mit niedriger Qualität ein.

definition.value: Includes expert opinion without explicit critical appraisal, or based on physiology, bench research, or 'first principles'.

valueString.value: Umfasst Expertenmeinung(en) ohne explizite kritische Beurteilung oder auf der Grundlage von Physiologie, Bench Research oder First Principles
